name: homebound
desc: A short puzzle platformer that explores the meaning of home. Play as an astronaut and a cat as they navigate through a desolate planet

name: Hawaii State Energy Office Virtual Tour
desc: Virtual reality tour of the different energy locations on the island featuring 360 degree video taken from the sites used by the Hawaii State Energy Office outreach programs.

name: An Answer for the Dust
desc: A top down rougelike where you protect your sister from hordes of zombies. Pick up coins and buy upgrades to keep surviving.
